body:
The 10.4 libraries are in Xcode 3.1.4 in /Developer/SDKs/ 
MacOSX10.4u.sdk/usr/X11R6/lib/.  But the X11 shared library version  
also seems to be the same in Mac OS 10.4 and 10.5, so I'm puzzled.


Randolph
